duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the technical design and oversight of development team activities
Coordinate and review cost estimates from engineering disciplines, track budgets and monthly estimates
Creation and management of the project schedule, working with the Program Scheduler
Interacting with technical management, professionals, technicians, and support personnel
Attending engineering, customer, or business meetings
Mentoring and coaching less experienced engineers
Participating in the preparation and leading of complex and significant proposals
Utilizing Earned Value Management to manage project indicators

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or related technical field with a minimum of 8 years of experience (Master's preferred)
